startFromScratch: Start from scratch with an empty mindmap
basicMindmapDescription: A simple mindmap with central node and main branches
complexMindmapDescription: Rich multi-level mindmap with many branches and details
hierarchicalStructureDescription: Perfect for org charts, taxonomies, and nested concepts
radialMindmapDescription: Symmetric radial layout ideal for balanced topics
brainstormingDescription: Ideal for creative ideation and group brainstorming
projectPlanningDescription: Timeline, tasks, milestones and dependencies ready
decisionTreeDescription: Map out decisions, outcomes and probabilities
studyNotesDescription: Organized structure for learning and revision
selectATemplateToGetStartedOrStartFromBl: Select a template to get started or start from blank
enterPromptChooseModeAttachFileAndModel: Enter prompt, choose mode, attach files and model
